name: Will Survive (Raphael)
description:
Will Survive is a game made by students of Digital Game Development Course at Catholic University of Pernambuco in 2021.

Is a 2D plataform game thats was inspired in others plataform casual games, your goal is to catch all the plants along the map and comeback to your ship before your oxygen end, your enemies are the "Gosmos" and you cannot kill them, just froze them.

Have FUN!!!
